挺好的游戏，现在还免费了，玩的人也挺多的，steam在限量长居榜首第一，枪战游戏第一，从小打CS1.6,现在打CSGO，是梦想，是期望，是回忆，是热爱！

imagine banning someone during a time when their account isn't even active and CS:GO made their laptop crash. VAC is shit, and valve is shit for not even having customer support. I bet was a such a tech whiz at the age of 16 to hack a game I had 12 hours in, huh? Fuck off.

A good game, especially for it's age. Extremely fun playing but can often disappoint you at times.

Easy game to understand and pick up, but has a very high skill ceiling.

Still alive after 7 years, great game mechanic and amazing community, might not be as friendly to newer players. Fantastic map design and balancing, worth a try. (since it is free)

CS is a great FPS game without cheats like any other game . It is just amazing . I cant stop playing it . Only nice friendly community, no toxicity at all . Nice graphics almost like Cyberpunk . I only can recommend this awesome game you cant do nothing wrong.
